text: Clive Bright (stage name: Tenor Saw; December 6, 1966 â€“ August 13, 1988) was an important reggae musician in the 1980s. He had several hit songs. His best- known one was "Ring the Alarm" in 1985. On August 13, 1988, Tenor Saw died after a hit and run crash in Houston, Texas. He was 21. title: Tenor Saw
